topics.body:
I just learned that apparently, Australia has two countries.

One is Australia, the other was a country made by accident after they declared a farmer king (by accident). I think it still exists but Australia has done very good in ignoring it.

Technically, that's the only part of the land that you won't be paykng taxes to the government.

Can't remember though.
